AK_DLL.OperatorDef.name: Shining
AK_DLL.OperatorDef.description: Simple, yet a mystery you can't seem to solve no matter what. Shining, Sarkaz healer, will do everything she can to provide medical care for the squad.

AK_DLL.OperatorDef.name: Silence
AK_DLL.OperatorDef.description: There’s no risk in the fruits of research, as they are only byproducts after all. Experimentation, on the other hand… Silence, medical specialist of Rhine Lab, will make use of the latest scientific developments on the battlefield.

AK_DLL.OperatorDef.name: Gavial
AK_DLL.OperatorDef.description: Her patients always have a peaceful look on their faces. Gavial, Medic Operator of Rhodes Island, will protect the lives of her squad members using her special techniques.

AK_DLL.OperatorDef.name: Nightingale
AK_DLL.OperatorDef.description: As simple as a blank sheet. Nightingale, Sarkaz healer, will do everything she can to provide medical care for the squad.

AK_DLL.OperatorDef.name: Perfumer
AK_DLL.OperatorDef.description: Anyone with a pollen allergy should stay away. Perfumer, manager of 'Health Garden,' will use her fragrant aromatherapy to heal the squad.

AK_DLL.OperatorDef.name: Ptilopsis
AK_DLL.OperatorDef.description: 101010111101000 Ptilopsis, database maintainer of Rhine Lab, activated. Please enter commands to operate.
